verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> and you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> Now thou son אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of man הֲתִשְׁפֹּ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> wilt thou judge הֲתִשְׁפֹּ֖ט <S%H8199><s%> wilt thou judge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> Ai הַדָּמִ֑ים <S%H1818><s%> the bloody וְה֣וֹדַעְתָּ֔הּ <S%H3045><s%> acknowledge אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all תּוֹעֲבוֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H8441><s%> her all her abominations

וְאָמַרְתָּ֗ <S%H559><s%> Then say כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> thou Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> The city שֹׁפֶ֥כֶת <S%H8210><s%> sheddeth דָּ֛ם <S%H1818><s%> blood בְּתוֹכָ֖הּ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst לָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> may come עִתָּ֑הּ <S%H6256><s%> of it that her time וְעָשְׂתָ֧ה <S%H6213><s%> and maketh גִלּוּלִ֛ים <S%H1544><s%> idols עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> contrary לְטָמְאָֽה׃ <S%H2930><s%> against herself to defile

בְּדָמֵ֨ךְ <S%H1818><s%> in thy blood אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which שָׁפַ֜כְתְּ <S%H8210><s%> that thou hast shed אָשַׁ֗מְתְּ <S%H816><s%> Thou art become guilty וּבְגִלּוּלַ֤יִךְ <S%H1544><s%> thyself in thine idols אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשִׂית֙ <S%H6213><s%> which thou hast made טָמֵ֔את <S%H2930><s%> and hast defiled וַתַּקְרִ֣יבִי <S%H7126><s%> to draw near יָמַ֔יִךְ <S%H3117><s%> and thou hast caused thy days וַתָּב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> and art come עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against שְׁנוֹתָ֑יִךְ <S%H8141><s%> [even] unto thy years עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> have I נְתַתִּ֤יךְ <S%H5414><s%> therefore have I made חֶרְפָּה֙ <S%H2781><s%> thee a reproach לַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> unto the heathen וְקַלָּסָ֖ה <S%H7048><s%> and a mocking לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הָאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H776><s%> to all countries

הַקְּרֹב֛וֹת <S%H7138><s%> [Those that be] near וְהָרְחֹק֥וֹת <S%H7350><s%> and [those that be] far מִמֵּ֖ךְ <S%H4480><s%> at יִתְקַלְּסוּ־ <S%H7046><s%> from thee shall mock בָ֑ךְ טְמֵאַ֣ת <S%H2931><s%> of ill הַשֵּׁ֔ם <S%H8034><s%> repute רַבַּ֖ת <S%H7227><s%> [and] much הַמְּהוּמָֽה׃ <S%H4103><s%> vexed

הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> Behold נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <S%H5387><s%> Behold the princes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one לִזְרֹע֖וֹ <S%H2220><s%> were in thee to their power הָ֣יוּ <S%H1961><s%> have been בָ֑ךְ לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> the purpose שְׁפָךְ־ <S%H8210><s%> to shed דָּֽם׃ <S%H1818><s%> blood

אָ֤ב <S%H1><s%> by father וָאֵם֙ <S%H517><s%> and mother הֵקַ֣לּוּ <S%H7043><s%> In thee have they set light בָ֔ךְ לַגֵּ֛ר <S%H1616><s%> with the stranger עָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> of thee have they dealt בַעֹ֖שֶׁק <S%H6233><s%> by oppression בְּתוֹכֵ֑ךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst יָת֥וֹם <S%H3490><s%> the fatherless וְאַלְמָנָ֖ה <S%H490><s%> and the widow ה֥וֹנוּ <S%H3238><s%> in thee have they vexed בָֽךְ׃
קָדָשַׁ֖י <S%H6944><s%> mine holy things בָּזִ֑ית <S%H959><s%> Thou hast despised וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁבְּתֹתַ֖י <S%H7676><s%> my sabbaths חִלָּֽלְתְּ׃ <S%H2490><s%> and hast profaned

אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H582><s%> In thee are men רָכִ֛יל <S%H7400><s%> that carry tales הָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> have been בָ֖ךְ לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> the purpose שְׁפָךְ־ <S%H8210><s%> to shed דָּ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> blood וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at הֶֽהָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains אָ֣כְלוּ <S%H398><s%> and in thee they eat בָ֔ךְ זִמָּ֖ה <S%H2154><s%> lewdness עָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> of thee they commit בְתוֹכֵֽךְ׃ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst

עֶרְוַת־ <S%H6172><s%> nakedness אָ֖ב <S%H1><s%> their fathers' גִּלָּה־ <S%H1540><s%> In thee have they discovered בָ֑ךְ טְמֵאַ֥ת <S%H2931><s%> for pollution הַנִּדָּ֖ה <S%H5079><s%> her that was set apart עִנּוּ־ <S%H6031><s%> in thee have they humbled בָֽךְ׃

וְאִ֣ישׁ ׀ <S%H376><s%> And one אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife רֵעֵ֗הוּ <S%H7453><s%> with his neighbour's עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> hath committed תּֽוֹעֵבָ֔ה <S%H8441><s%> abomination וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and another אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּלָּת֖וֹ <S%H3618><s%> his daughter in law טִמֵּ֣א <S%H2930><s%> defiled בְזִמָּ֑ה <S%H2154><s%> hath lewdly וְאִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and another אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחֹת֥וֹ <S%H269><s%> his sister בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> his father's עִנָּה־ <S%H6031><s%> in thee hath humbled בָֽךְ׃

שֹׁ֥חַד <S%H7810><s%> gifts לָֽקְחוּ־ <S%H3947><s%> In thee have they taken בָ֖ךְ לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of שְׁפָךְ־ <S%H8210><s%> to shed דָּ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> blood נֶ֧שֶׁךְ <S%H5392><s%> usury וְתַרְבִּ֣ית <S%H8636><s%> and increase לָקַ֗חַתְּ <S%H3947><s%> thou hast taken וַתְּבַצְּעִ֤י <S%H1214><s%> and thou hast greedily gained רֵעַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H7453><s%> of thy neighbours בַּעֹ֔שֶׁק <S%H6233><s%> by extortion וְאֹתִ֣י <S%H853><s%> שָׁכַ֔חַתְּ <S%H7911><s%> and hast forgotten נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> me saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> Behold הִכֵּ֣יתִי <S%H5221><s%> Behold therefore I have smitten כַפִּ֔י <S%H3709><s%> mine hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at בִּצְעֵ֖ךְ <S%H1215><s%> at thy dishonest gain אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשִׂ֑ית <S%H6213><s%> which thou hast made וְעַ֨ל־ <S%H5921><s%> and at דָּמֵ֔ךְ <S%H1818><s%> and at thy blood אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּתוֹכֵֽךְ׃ <S%H8432><s%> which hath been in the midst

הֲיַעֲמֹ֤ד <S%H5975><s%> endure לִבֵּךְ֙ <S%H3820><s%> Can thine heart אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or תֶּחֱזַ֣קְנָה <S%H2388><s%> be strong יָדַ֔יִךְ <S%H3027><s%> or can thine hands לַיָּמִ֕ים <S%H3117><s%> in the days אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I עֹשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> that I shall deal אוֹתָ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> for אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> with thee? I the LORD דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> have spoken וְעָשִֽׂיתִי׃ <S%H6213><s%> [it] and will do

וַהֲפִיצוֹתִ֤י <S%H6327><s%> And I will scatter אוֹתָךְ֙ <S%H853><s%> בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> thee among the heathen וְזֵרִיתִ֖יךְ <S%H2219><s%> and disperse בָּאֲרָצ֑וֹת <S%H776><s%> thee in the countries וַהֲתִמֹּתִ֥י <S%H8552><s%> and will consume טֻמְאָתֵ֖ךְ <S%H2932><s%> thy filthiness מִמֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

וְנִחַ֥לְתְּ <S%H2490><s%> will profane בָּ֖ךְ לְעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in thyself in the sight גוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen וְיָדַ֖עַתְּ <S%H3045><s%> and thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD פ
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man הָיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> has become לִ֥י בֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel [לְסוּג כ] (לְסִ֑יג <S%H5509><s%> dross ק) כֻּלָּ֡ם <S%H3605><s%> all נְ֠חֹשֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> all they [are] brass וּבְדִ֨יל <S%H913><s%> and tin וּבַרְזֶ֤ל <S%H1270><s%> and iron וְעוֹפֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H5777><s%> and lead בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst כּ֔וּר <S%H3564><s%> of the furnace סִגִ֥ים <S%H5509><s%> is to me become dross כֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver הָיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> has become ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD יַ֛עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because הֱי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> have become כֻּלְּכֶ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> all לְסִגִ֑ים <S%H5509><s%> Because ye are all become dross לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> therefore הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> I am going קֹבֵ֣ץ <S%H6908><s%> behold therefore I will gather אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into תּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> you into the midst יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem

קְבֻ֣צַת <S%H6910><s%> [As] they gather כֶּ֡סֶף <S%H3701><s%> silver וּ֠נְחֹשֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> and brass וּבַרְזֶ֨ל <S%H1270><s%> and iron וְעוֹפֶ֤רֶת <S%H5777><s%> and lead וּבְדִיל֙ <S%H913><s%> and tin אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into תּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> into the midst כּ֔וּר <S%H3564><s%> of the furnace לָפַֽחַת־ <S%H5301><s%> to blow עָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> and אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire לְהַנְתִּ֑יךְ <S%H5413><s%> upon it to melt כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> so אֶקְבֹּץ֙ <S%H6908><s%> [it] so will I gather בְּאַפִּ֣י <S%H639><s%> [you] in mine anger וּבַחֲמָתִ֔י <S%H2534><s%> and in my fury וְהִנַּחְתִּ֥י <S%H3240><s%> and I will leave וְהִתַּכְתִּ֖י <S%H5413><s%> [you there] and melt אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְכִנַּסְתִּ֣י <S%H3664><s%> Yea I will gather אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וְנָפַחְתִּ֥י <S%H5301><s%> you and blow עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> on בְּאֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> upon you in the fire עֶבְרָתִ֑י <S%H5678><s%> of my wrath וְנִתַּכְתֶּ֖ם <S%H5413><s%> and ye shall be melted בְּתוֹכָֽהּ׃ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst

כְּהִתּ֥וּךְ <S%H2046><s%> is melted כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> As silver בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst כּ֔וּר <S%H3564><s%> of the furnace כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> so תֻּתְּכ֣וּ <S%H5413><s%> so shall ye be melted בְתוֹכָ֑הּ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <S%H3045><s%> thereof and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that I the LORD שָׁפַ֥כְתִּי <S%H8210><s%> have poured out חֲמָתִ֖י <S%H2534><s%> my fury עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> and פ
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man אֱמָר־ <S%H559><s%> say לָ֕הּ אַ֣תְּ <S%H859><s%> you אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto her Thou [art] the land לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not מְטֹהָרָ֖ה <S%H2891><s%> that is not cleansed הִ֑יא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor גֻשְׁמָ֖הּ <S%H1656><s%> nor rained בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> upon in the day זָֽעַם׃ <S%H2195><s%> of indignation

קֶ֤שֶׁר <S%H7195><s%> [There is] a conspiracy נְבִיאֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5030><s%> of her prophets בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst כַּאֲרִ֥י <S%H738><s%> lion שׁוֹאֵ֖ג <S%H7580><s%> thereof like a roaring טֹ֣רֵֽף <S%H2963><s%> ravening טָ֑רֶף <S%H2964><s%> the prey נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> souls אָכָ֗לוּ <S%H398><s%> they have devoured חֹ֤סֶן <S%H2633><s%> the treasure וִיקָר֙ <S%H3366><s%> and precious things יִקָּ֔חוּ <S%H3947><s%> they have taken אַלְמְנוֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H490><s%> widows הִרְבּ֥וּ <S%H7235><s%> they have made her many בְתוֹכָֽהּ׃ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst

כֹּהֲנֶ֜יהָ <S%H3548><s%> Her priests חָמְס֣וּ <S%H2554><s%> have violated תוֹרָתִי֮ <S%H8451><s%> my law וַיְחַלְּל֣וּ <S%H2490><s%> and have profaned קָדָשַׁי֒ <S%H6944><s%> mine holy things בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> between קֹ֤דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> between the holy לְחֹל֙ <S%H2455><s%> and profane לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no הִבְדִּ֔ילוּ <S%H914><s%> they have put no difference וּבֵין־ <S%H996><s%> between הַטָּמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> [difference] between the unclean לְטָה֖וֹר <S%H2889><s%> and the clean לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no הוֹדִ֑יעוּ <S%H3045><s%> neither have they shewed וּמִשַׁבְּתוֹתַי֙ <S%H7676><s%> from my sabbaths הֶעְלִ֣ימוּ <S%H5956><s%> and have hid עֵֽינֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> their eyes וָאֵחַ֖ל <S%H2490><s%> and I am profaned בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> among

שָׂרֶ֣יהָ <S%H8269><s%> Her princes בְקִרְבָּ֔הּ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst כִּזְאֵבִ֖ים <S%H2061><s%> thereof [are] like wolves טֹ֣רְפֵי <S%H2963><s%> ravening טָ֑רֶף <S%H2964><s%> the prey לִשְׁפָּךְ־ <S%H8210><s%> to shed דָּם֙ <S%H1818><s%> blood לְאַבֵּ֣ד <S%H6><s%> [and] to destroy נְפָשׁ֔וֹת <S%H5315><s%> souls לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> order בְּצֹ֥עַ <S%H1214><s%> to get בָּֽצַע׃ <S%H1215><s%> dishonest gain

וּנְבִיאֶ֗יהָ <S%H5030><s%> And her prophets טָח֤וּ <S%H2902><s%> have daubed לָהֶם֙ תָּפֵ֔ל <S%H8602><s%> them with untempered חֹזִ֣ים <S%H2374><s%> [morter] seeing שָׁ֔וְא <S%H7723><s%> vanity וְקֹסְמִ֥ים <S%H7080><s%> and divining לָהֶ֖ם כָּזָ֑ב <S%H3577><s%> lies אֹמְרִ֗ים <S%H559><s%> unto them saying כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD וַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> when the LORD לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> has not דִבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> hath not spoken

עַ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> The people הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> of the land עָ֣שְׁקוּ <S%H6231><s%> yea they have oppressed עֹ֔שֶׁק <S%H6233><s%> oppression וְגָזְל֖וּ <S%H1497><s%> and exercised גָּזֵ֑ל <S%H1498><s%> robbery וְעָנִ֤י <S%H6041><s%> the poor וְאֶבְיוֹן֙ <S%H34><s%> and needy הוֹנ֔וּ <S%H3238><s%> and have vexed וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגֵּ֥ר <S%H1616><s%> the stranger עָשְׁק֖וּ <S%H6231><s%> oppressed בְּלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> wrongfully

וָאֲבַקֵּ֣שׁ <S%H1245><s%> And I sought מֵהֶ֡ם <S%H1992><s%> for אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> for a man גֹּֽדֵר־ <S%H1443><s%> among them that should make up גָּדֵר֩ <S%H1447><s%> the hedge וְעֹמֵ֨ד <S%H5975><s%> and stand בַּפֶּ֧רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> in the gap לְפָנַ֛י <S%H6440><s%> before בְּעַ֥ד <S%H1157><s%> for הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me for the land לְבִלְתִּ֣י <S%H1115><s%> so שַׁחֲתָ֑הּ <S%H7843><s%> that I should not destroy וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> no מָצָֽאתִי׃ <S%H4672><s%> it but I found

וָאֶשְׁפֹּ֤ךְ <S%H8210><s%> Therefore have I poured out עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> out זַעְמִ֔י <S%H2195><s%> mine indignation בְּאֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> them with the fire עֶבְרָתִ֖י <S%H5678><s%> of my wrath כִּלִּיתִ֑ים <S%H3615><s%> upon them I have consumed דַּרְכָּם֙ <S%H1870><s%> their own way בְּרֹאשָׁ֣ם <S%H7218><s%> upon their heads נָתַ֔תִּי <S%H5414><s%> have I recompensed נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD פ
